HISTORY: Founded 1993. Previously known as Dnipropetrovs'kij Universitet Ekonomiki ta Prava (Dnipropetrovsk University of Economics and Law). Acquired current title 2011
NOTE: Also Pre-University Training Programmes, 10 months; Also Double Degrees in Law and Business Communication or Law and Management, Social Welfare with Wyższa Szkoła Humanitas University (Wyrozniona Ministerstwa Nauki I Szkolnictwa Wyzszego), Poland; Bachelor in English Philology, Master in Management of International Projects offered jointly with with University of Occupational Safety Management in Katowice, Poland; British degree BA (Hons) in International Management validated by University of Wales Trinity Saint David, UK
